UK police firearms officer pleads not guilty to Black man's murderA British police officer on Friday pleaded not guilty in a London court to the murder of a Black man who was shot dead during an incident in London. Fri, 08 Mar 2024 10:15:18 GMT KE2F5AG2JJOZXPKM7DCM6C5X2A https://www.reuters.com/world/uk/uk-police-firearms-officer-pleads-not-guilty-black-man-murder-2024-03-08/Reuters世界英国
Scope of Hong Kong's new national security lawsHong Kong on Friday published its new national security draft law, a document that broadens the definition of crimes including sabotage, sedition and state secrets, and stipulates tougher penalties of up to life imprisonment. Fri, 08 Mar 2024 10:09:23 GMT YPBLR7NGOVLHDI4S3YJZMCPENU https://www.reuters.com/world/china/scope-hong-kong-new-national-security-laws-2024-03-08/James Pomfret世界中国
'Generation Putin' - young Russians reflect on his 24 years in powerZaurbek, 27, sees President Vladimir Putin as the guarantor of Russia's stability. Egor, 18, says bluntly that Russia's leaders are "unworthy". Fri, 08 Mar 2024 10:02:16 GMT ISQQD65U5FM3NEDKH4LH4GVOEY https://www.reuters.com/world/europe/ Generation-putin-young-Russians-reflect-his-24-years-power-2024-03-08/Reuters世界欧洲
Russia's Medvedev says Biden is a 'mad' disgrace to AmericaDmitry Medvedev, an ally of Russian President Vladimir Putin, called Joe Biden a "mad" disgrace to the United States on Friday and said the U.S. president had no right to compare himself to Franklin D. Roosevelt. Fri, 08 Mar 2024 09:56:58 GMT KQKUUJOGMBNQ3JKTQRKCJCFQBY https://www.reuters.com/world/ Russia-with-dev-says-biden-ice-food-disgrace-america-2024-03-08/Reuters世界
Police bust art forgery ring in Spain selling fake Banksy worksPolice in Spain have dismantled an art forgery ring suspected of selling artworks falsely attributed to British street artist Banksy, with some pieces fetching prices of 1,500 euros ($1,640) or higher. Fri, 08 Mar 2024 09:43:27 GMT HWTM3BRWBJI63CCJQ7PM64C3RM https://www.reuters.com/world/europe/police-bust-art-forgery-ring-spain- sell-fake-banksy-works-2024-03-08/Reuters世界欧洲
World food price index falls in February for seventh straight month, says UN agencyThe United Nations food agency's world price index fell in February for a seventh consecutive month as lower prices for all major cereals more than offset the rising price of sugar and meat. Fri, 08 Mar 2024 09:20:12 GMT新5ABO33OY4KRWYHFT44I https://www.reuters.com/world/world-food-price-index-falls-february-seventh-straight-month-un-fao-2024-03-08/Maytaal Angel世界
India says it busts trafficking racket duping people into fighting for Russia in UkraineIndia said it had busted a "major human trafficking network" which lured young men to Russia with the promise of jobs only to force them to fight in the war in Ukraine. Fri, 08 Mar 2024 09:10:42 GMT BCNEN6LTUJM3NBVQRGLBEFTW64 https://www.reuters.com/world/india-says-it-busts-trafficking-racket-duping-people-into-fighting- Russia-2024-03-08/Reuters世界
South Korea to improve young doctors' pay, denies healthcare is in crisisSouth Korea will move quickly to improve pay and working conditions for young doctors, the government said on Friday, tackling a key demand by medical trainees who have walked off the job, but denying there was a full-scale healthcare crisis. Fri, 08 Mar 2024 09:07:31 GMT 2EQR3TUZJNIHVMJFLFAKBRZEI https://www.reuters.com/world/asia-pacific/south-korea-improves-young-doctors-pay-denies-healthcare-is-crisis-2024-03-08/Reuters商业工作世界
Taiwan urges China not to change 'status quo' around waters near Kinmen islandsTaiwan's Mainland Affairs Council on Friday urged China not to change the "status quo" around waters near Taiwan-controlled Kinmen islands by sending coast guard boats into restricted areas. Fri, 08 Mar 2024 08:34:48 GMT 6WCOYZRHSJLPRM3ZG5ECAIYLLI https://www.reuters.com/world/taiwan-urges-china-not-change-status-quo-around-waters-near-kinmen-islands-2024-03-08/Reuters世界
U.S. embassy warns of imminent attack in Moscow by 'extremists'The U.S. embassy in Russia warned that "extremists" had imminent plans for an attack in Moscow, hours after Russian security services said they had foiled a planned shooting at a synagogue by a cell from the Afghan arm of Islamic State. China says more Indian troops at Himalayan border won't ease tensionsChina believes that India's move to add more troops at their disputed border is "not conducive to easing tensions", a foreign ministry spokesperson said on Friday.
